description: This CSS file contains styles and variable definitions for theming and layout of the Tic Tac Toe web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling class for the application, setting text alignment, background color, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, managing layout, background color, and display properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the application logo, which includes animation and size properties.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
